item.title: 2020-06-17: Finished a book
item.description: I’ve finished a book, “MASTERING CIVILITY”. The reason that I wanted to read this book is that I expected it helps me in life. Because I always have at least one rude friend or colleague, so I want to deal with it well. Even if I belong to any companies or any communities in the future, I must be having at least one rude person, I think. The book said that if you met rude person in your office, you should care about only yourself and your future.
